text:
Tomcat.bat always starts tomcat with the tomcat.policy file but it is not there
by default in wrapper.properties.
creator: Dave@JungleMoss.com
Dave@JungleMoss.com
text:
Created attachment 648
Here is a patch for wrapper.properties

I've committed your patch to the 3.3 HEAD, and it will appear in 3.3 Final.

For this to actually have any effect, you still need to edit the 
wrapper.properties file and add a "-security" to the end (or set it in the 
server.xml file).
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
